page.title: 11SCHOOLS IN THE PAST
page.content: We asked Mrs.Smith What were the schools like? Schools were alot more formal than they are today.There was a lot more harshness in its discipline you had to sit and not wander about the class room or anything like that. When we started school in the morning.You had to get into line and march into school.We sat at desks two together with lids on top of the desks and inside the desks we had our pens & books.On top there was an ink well which had to be kept filled.Sometimes people were naughty and flicked ink on peoples clothes.We had to have blotting paper which is an absorbent paper.When you wrote with your pen it left it moist so you had to blot it so that it didn't go all over the place.We learnt our tables and we had to learn a lot of poetry.
